title: Denver the last dinosaur. 1. The Monster of lost lake
brief_description: While camping at a mountain lake with his group of ingenious young friends, Denver, the last dinosaur, is mistaken for a horrible lake monster. Hordes of thrill-seeking tourists descend upon the lake, and the boys must use their wits to protect the environment and their friend.
